title: Parent keeps son room intact even when married

content.question: A parent who keeps a son’s room intact even though he’s been happily married and in his own home for five years is exhibiting which of the following defense mechanisms?

topic.text: 4.4: Psychodynamic and Humanistic Theories of Personality

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
